activities: Actio Corporation provides SDS management services, regulatory reporting and supply chain raw material analysis as Software as a Service. A manufacturer will contract with Actio to campaign (send emails) to their raw material suppliers to determine the chemical composition of the raw material or part. This is used to do compliance checks against various governmental agencies or corporate sustainability objectives and to determine if the finished good produced by the manufacturer has any compliance issues. This requires Actio to email supplier contacts to request compositional information.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
industrysector: Computer Services - (CSV)Industrial Chemicals - (ICH)Automotive Parts & Service Equipment - (APS)Consumer Electronics - (CEL)
recoursemech: ICDR/AAA is the administrator for Actio's independent recourse mechanism for the U.S.-EU & U.S – SWISS Safe Harbor Program
